segments.text: Yes , please . I'd like to buy a gift for my younger brother . He's going to take a trip to South America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By air . So my gift should be quite light . What can you suggest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this wallet ? It's made of fine leather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My sister already gave him one . I like something unusual .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This gift is the best for a man who has everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , a nice handkerchief . That's a great idea . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S2
